pages: Excellent, you have found another part of the tome. My confidence in you is growing. Once again, take the tome and chapter and leave. Study in a secluded and safe place. As mentioned before, bees are your friends. They will help you throughout your journey.

When you have the time you can find my apprentice. He left some time ago to pursue his own path. The stubborn fool never had the patience for brewing, and I guess he didn't appreciate my teaching methods.

In an act of rebellion, he decided to take some of my work. Which is fine, I doubt he's going to get anywhere. His friend, she's the smart one out of the two. Find her, she can help you further your crystal research.

Now go, burn this book if you have to.

-Valor Margrith
